vlive.english: What should we do to improve concentration?

examples.korean: The sudden noise put her off her game. 발음듣기 그 갑작스런 소리 때문에 그녀가 경기 집중력이 흐트러졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sudden noise put her off her game. 발음

examples.korean: His concentration lapsed after a few minutes. 발음듣기 몇 분이 지나자 그의 집중력이 차츰 약해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His concentration lapsed after a few minutes. 발음

examples.korean: The drug may affect your powers of concentration. 발음듣기 그 약물은 집중력에 영향을 줄 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The drug may affect your powers of concentration. 발음

examples.korean: She was possessed of exceptional powers of concentration. 발음듣기 그녀는 비범한 집중력을 지니고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was possessed of exceptional powers of concentration. 발음

examples.korean: Tiredness affects your powers of concentration. 발음듣기 피로는 사람의 집중력에 영향을 미친다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tiredness affects your powers of concentration. 발음
